CREATE TRIGGER [ZHUANGBEI] ON [dbo].[GameUser] WITH ENCRYPTION 
after Insert 
as 
declare @name nvarchar(20)

SELECT @name=strUserID FROM INSERTED

Update [GameUser] set   WHERE strUserID=@name and byClass=0

Update [GameUser] set   WHERE strUserID=@name and byClass=1

Update [GameUser] set   WHERE strUserID=@name and byClass=2

Update [GameUser] set   WHERE strUserID=@name and byClass=3
